company_website.summary: Yummi Karma is a California-based cannabis brand that produces a variety of products including edibles, tinctures, and vape products. They have been in business for over a decade and are known for their high-quality, fun, and functional cannabis products.
company_website.infomration_about_the_team: The key executives and decision makers at Oc Beauty Manufacturers, LLC (Yummi Karma) appear to be Chelsea Kitahara, Jerilyn Favia, and Krystal Kitahara, who are listed as the business owners. However, I was unable to find detailed contact information for these individuals.

executives.name: Chelsea Kitahara
executives.customer_note: Chelsea Kitahara is listed as a business owner of Oc Beauty Manufacturers, LLC (Yummi Karma).

executives.name: Jerilyn Favia
executives.customer_note: Jerilyn Favia is listed as a business owner of Oc Beauty Manufacturers, LLC (Yummi Karma). She previously held the position of Controller at the company.
